Affirm Holdings Inc AFRM.O::
*AFFIRM REPORTS FISCAL YEAR 2022 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS *Q1 REVENUE $269.4 MILLION
*SEES FY REVENUE $1,225 TO $1,250 MILLION *SEES FY GMV $13.13 TO $13.38 BILLION *SEES Q2 REVENUE $320 TO $330 MILLION *SEES Q2 GMV $3.55 TO $3.65 BILLION *QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $1.13
*Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.30, REVENUE VIEW $248.2 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA *Q2 REVENUE VIEW $296.1 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA *FY2022 REVENUE VIEW $1.20 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA *EXPANDS AMAZON RELATIONSHIP TO ALL ELIGIBLE U.S. PURCHASES *AFFIRM TO BE EMBEDDED AS PAYMENT OPTION IN AMAZON PAY'S DIGITAL WALLET IN U.S.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 10-NOV-202121:07:00.327 GMT
